name: handbag
content:

A2 a small bag for money, keys, make-up, etc., carried especially by women
digibabe/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
Examples
I've got far too much clobber in my handbag.She took her hairbrush from her handbag and began to brush her hair.Her handbag was snatched from her in the street.She beat off her attacker by hitting him with her handbag.I scooped up my belongings into my handbag.
